info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 8:27PM EDT until April 15 at 8:45AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River.
Eel River at Bowling Green.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River.
.Significant flooding is already occurring along the White River due to multiple rounds of heavy rainfall that brought around 5 to 9 inches to the area. Major flooding is expected from Spencer downstream on the White. The crest on the upper White should reach Noblesville Monday morning, with much of the middle White cresting Monday and Petersburg and Hazleton not cresting until the end of the week.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Edwardsport.
* WHEN...Until Tuesday, April 15.
* IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Many agricultural levees overflow. Evacuations are necessary in northeast Edwardsport. Officials closely monitor Levee Unit #8. Many local roads are impassable. Rail traffic halts at Elnora. White River is over two miles wide at U.S. Highway 50.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EDT Sunday /6:00 PM CDT Sunday/ the stage was 24.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EDT Sunday /6:00 PM CDT Sunday/ was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.5 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, April 14. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Monday morning by around 1130 AM EDT /1030 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, APRIL 15

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Gibson, IN; Knox, IN; Pike, IN
